content:
CP 617 Firestop Putty Pad Moldable firestop putty to help protect electrical outlet boxes, junction boxes and metallic washer/dryer boxes ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop putties- - - ### FEATURES:Features Excellent adhesion to gypsum, metal and plastic Putty remains flexible over time Pad can be molded by hand without leaving residue on hands Quick and simple to install Low electrical conductivity Applications Commercial and residential applications Acoustically rated drywall - sound transmission classification 59 according to ASTM E90-97 (based on specific construction) General gypsum wall assemblies with wood or metal studs For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approx. Density: 1.6 g/cm³ Color: Red Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84): Flame spread: 15Smoke development: 10 Technical Data | Approx. Density | 1.6 g/cm³ | Color | Red | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 15
Smoke development: 10 | LEED VOC | 2 g/l | Application temperature range | 32 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 309760 - Putty pad CP 617 6 x 7 (case of 20) - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x CP 617 6x7 Firestop putty pad - 333583 - Putty pad CP 617L 7 x 7 (case of 20) - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x CP 617L 7x7 Firestop putty pad - 373387 - Putty pad CP 617XL 9 x 9 (case of 20) - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x CP 617XL 9x9 Firestop putty pad - 3667019 - CP 617 6x7 PUTTY PADS HALF PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1620x CP 617 6x7 Firestop putty pad - 3667020 - CP 617 7x7 PUTTY PADS HALF PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1800x CP 617L 7x7 Firestop putty pad - 3591769 - Putty Pad CP 617 9x9 Bulk Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1440x CP 617XL 9x9 Firestop putty pad - 3591767 - Putty Pad CP 617 6x7 Bulk Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3240x CP 617 6x7 Firestop putty pad - 3591768 - Putty Pad CP 617 7x7 Bulk Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3600x CP 617L 7x7 Firestop putty pad
